# Baseball Savant

You can access baseball savant at [this link](https://baseballsavant.mlb.com/ "this is baseball savant"){style="color: blue;"}.

Additionally, this is some R code:

```{r}
#| include: false
number <- 10

```

This code prints the number 10:

```{r}
print(number)
```
You can also create plots:
```{r}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
df <- tibble(
  x = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
  y = c(6, 7, 8, 9, 10),
  z = c(11, 12, 13, 14, 15)
)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

df %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = z))
```
